justification: Misreads Team B’s preferences: offers a Tier 4 deep-threat WR and committee RB to a conservative, volume-prioritizing manager while asking for B’s higher-tier RB and WR. Calls Nick Holt a possession WR and Josh Garcia “stable” despite Holt’s deep-threat profile and Garcia’s declining role. Trade heavily favors A; 62% accept likelihood is unrealistic. Rationale is brief and generic, with scant ToM or schedule/volume nuance.
